author: nazarhussain
content: Ayy thoughts on this from other client teams?

author: jtraglia
content: Hey there consensus devs. We've published [the v1.6.0-alpha.6 specifications](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/releases/tag/v1.6.0-alpha.6). It fixes a typo in a new configuration variable, removes two deprecated configuration variables, introduces BAL specs, and adds more tests for fulu/gloas.
